channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chapter, a Medicare startup with links to Vance, Thiel, and Ramaswamy, just raised a round at $1.5B valuation
item.description: Chapter, a Medicare advisory startup co-founded by former Republican presidential hopeful Vivek Ramaswamy, has closed a $75 million funding round at a...

item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Haven’t Resulted in Higher Prices on Amazon—Yet
item.description: The ecommerce site penalizes sellers for abrupt price hikes, and many are hesitant to make risky changes amid a volatile trade war.

item.title: This ‘College Protester’ Isn’t Real. It’s an AI-Powered Undercover Bot for Cops
item.description: Massive Blue is helping cops deploy AI-powered social media bots to talk to people they suspect are anything from violent sex criminals all the way to...

item.title: Measles Cases Are Rising. Other Preventable Diseases Could Follow
item.description: Amid an ongoing measles outbreak, the US is also facing a surge in pertussis, or whooping cough. As vaccine rates drop, other diseases could be next.

item.title: xAI adds a ‘memory’ feature to Grok
item.description: Elon Musk’s AI company, xAI, is slowly bringing its Grok chatbot to parity with top rivals like ChatGPT and Google’s Gemini. On Wednesday night, xAI a...

item.title: If I Don’t Use AI, Will My Grandkids Still Think I’m Cool?
item.description: WIRED’s advice columnist pushes back on the idea that ChatGPT and other generative AI software tools foster connections with other people.

item.title: Smashing, the reading curation app by Goodreads’ founder, shuts down
item.description: Smashing, an AI-powered app that lets users build a curated list of news and posts, is shutting down, because of its inability to scale rapidly enough...

item.title: Newegg Promo Code: 10% Off - April 2025
item.description: Enjoy 10% off your entire order with today’s Newegg discount code and save with the latest coupons and deals for gaming PCs, laptops and computer part...

item.title: Zoom restores service after an hours-long outage
item.description: Zoom says its platform is back online after suffering an outage for much of Wednesday afternoon. “Service has now been restored after the earlier outa...

item.title: Trump administration reportedly considers a US DeepSeek ban
item.description: The Trump administration is considering new restrictions on the Chinese AI lab DeepSeek that would limit it from buying Nvidia’s AI chips and potentia...
